message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"online friend","sentence":"网友来我家。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene of two friendly, cartoonish figures sitting together in a cozy room with a glowing laptop in front of them, suggesting they are online friends meeting. Through a window, the outside world looks softly surreal and apocalyptic, with pastel tones and dreamy lighting.","sentence_translation":"An online friend comes to my home."}
